ComicInfo.Title: Notes #38; Those Bitchy Blues; Bye-Bye Home; Just Another Dream; Louis Wain; Gator!; Good news, darlin'!; Gulf War Diary - April 4th 2003
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-05-18 00:35:45. [CVDB164621] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-10 22:43:47. [Issue ID 170751]
ComicInfo.Summary:
Midge obsesses about politics. Mom and Aunt Hazel invite her over to dinner and tell her they'll send her on a cruise when they get the money that nice priest promised them in that email message that Midge had said was "Great!"
Roberta has to move out of the house she's lived in for 14 years
Roberta narrates a dream
Biography of an artist (1860-1939) whose cat illustrations help promote their image as a cuddly house pet, and in later years became strikingly abstract; Gregory's illustrations use anthropomorphic characters.
Young Patty's adventures with an alligator living in a water trap on the neighboring golf course.
